attributes.action: Let fathers have the option for more paternity leave!
attributes.background: As a mother-to-be, ive been thinking a lot lately about how my baby is going to bond with her father properly when hes only entitled to 2 weeks paternity. In my opinion men should have a lot more of a choice when it comes to paternity leave, no one should be denied the chance of bonding with a baby!

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what choices you would like men to have about taking paternity leave.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
